title: President Rajapaksa inaugurates two bridges for public use
content: Source: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma – Pic By Chandana Perera President Mahinda Rajapaksa inaugurated a bridge across the river at Hirana, Bandaragama and another flyover bridge at Pannipitiya this morning on 12th January. President Rajapaksa inspected the Bandaragama Bridge linking Hirana in Panadura and Kidelpitiya in Bandaragama and instructed to open it immediately…
